memories_desc: This is a collection of all the memories you have contributed, except those moved to My Archive.
favorites_desc: This is a collection of memories you have made favorites by clicking the heart icon on the memory's page.
likes_desc: This is a collection of memories you have made likes by clicking the heart icon on the memory's page.
bookmarks_desc: This is a collection of memories you have bookmarked by clicking the bookmark icon on the memory's page.
archive_desc: You can move memories here that you no longer want to see in My Memories.
deleted_desc: This is a collection of memories you have recently deleted.
